description: For fast, light alpine missions, the Trango Ice Cube offers superb performance on snow, ice and rock. Seamless uppers are waterproof and have protective integrated gaiters to keep out snow and debris. They're light enough that you won't feel weighed down when throwing a figure 4, kicking steps or billy-goating along ridgelines. For sustained snowy routes or summer trekking, waterproof-breathable liners ensure protection and outstanding temperature control. Carbon shafts underfoot add rigidity for use with crampons and the midsoles absorb the impact of rough terrain on convoluted descents. Lateral flexibility in the ankles adds stability to make your foot placements precise and controlled on edges and on steep faces.Uppers are synthetic fabric that's injected with a thermo-plastic for outstanding waterproofing and abrasion resistance.Schoeller soft shell gaiter with a heat-sealed, water-repellent zip to keep out snow and water.Lace system features external eyelets for a nuanced fit.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX insulated comfort liner.Footbed uses insulated 3mm carbon Honeycomb tech shaft for rigidity without heaviness.Midsole has shock absorbing polyurethane inserts in the toe and heel.3D Flex System allows for lateral ankle movement for control on uneven terrain.Vibram® sole with impact braking system lugged heel and sticky rubber compound in the toe for precise edging.
name: La Sportiva Trango Ice Cube Gore-Tex Boots - Men's
